mapper.select: select vcl.* from (select a.*, rownum as rnum, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) /#{pageSize} + 1) as pageNumber from (select * from vwclasslist where categoryBig = #{categoryBig} order by ${filter}) a) vcl where vcl.pageNumber = #{nowpage}

select vcl.*, rownum as rnum, FLOOR((ROWNUM - 1) /#{pageSize} + 1) pageNumber from (select * from vwclasslist where categoryBig = #{categoryBig} and categorySmall = #{categorySmall} order by ${filter}) vcl where vcl.pageNumber = #{nowpage}
select c.*, (select min(price) from tblClassOption where classSeq = #{cSeq}) as price from tblClass c where classSeq = #{cSeq}
select * from tblHost where hostSeq = (select hostSeq from tblClass where classSeq = #{cSeq})
select count(*) from tblClass where hostSeq = #{hostSeq}

select count(*) from tblClass c inner join tblClassOption co on c.classSeq = co.classSeq inner join tblSignupClass sc on co.classOptionSeq = sc.classOptionSeq inner join tblClassReview cr on sc.signupSeq = cr.signupSeq where c.hostSeq = (select hostSeq from tblClass where classSeq = #{cSeq})
select count(*) from tblHostScrap where hostSeq = #{cSeq}

select u.name, co.classOption, cr.classReviewSeq, cr.content, cr.score, cr.recommend, ri.reviewImage from tblUser u inner join tblSignupClass sc on u.userSeq = sc.userSeq inner join tblClassOption co on sc.classOptionSeq = co.ClassOptionSeq inner join tblClassReview cr on sc.signupSeq = cr.signupSeq inner join tblReviewImage ri on cr.classReviewSeq = ri.classReviewSeq where co.classSeq = #{cSeq} order by cr.classReviewSeq desc

select o.classOptionSeq, o.classseq, o.classdate, o.classoption, o.price, o.personnel, count(s.signupseq) as signup from tblClassOption o left outer join tblSignupClass s on o.classOptionSeq = s.classOptionSeq where classSeq = #{classSeq} group by o.classOptionSeq, o.classseq, o.classdate, o.classoption, o.price, o.personnel order by o.classdate asc
select userSeq from tblUser where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBLSIGNUPCLASS (signupSeq, userSeq, classOptionSeq, regdate) values (seqSignupClass.nextVal, #{userSeq}, #{classOptionSeq}, default)
mapper.select: select cl.*,rownum from (select * from vwClassList order by recommend desc) cl where rownum 1 and 8
